formattedAddress: 205 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013, USA
adrFormatAddress: 205 Hudson St, New York, NY 10013, USA

originalText.text:
Bought three different pairs of paloma sunglasses in 2020 (!), really liked one of them and wanted to return the remaining two. After many many emails back and forth of CC trying to get me to agree on a discount, I was finally provided with a return label. I immediately sent the parcel on its way and received confirmation that the refund is already processed and on its way in January 2021. At the end of February I had still not received my refund, so I asked again what is going on. They confirmeAccounting error, only a matter of weeks. In June 2021 I asked again, their reply: "I am truly sorry you haven't received your refund. I will get this fixed ASAP and you will receive it this week!". I did not receive it that week either. After 23 emails and over 2.5 years, I am still waiting.

My opinion on the sunglasses remains unchanged, I like their look and they feel like a quality build. Please make this right and issue my refund. Thank you.

originalText.text: Recently purchased my 3rd pair of Christopher Cloos sunglasses since I love the way they look, the quality of materials they use, and their solid construction. I had a problem when UPS lost my glasses during transport and were giving me the runaround. I called Cloos support about the situation and they were very supportive and quickly sent me a replacement pair without hassle. Can't say enough about their customer service and prompt attention to my dilemma. These are the best sunglasses I've owned by far and their customer service  is exceptional. Highly recommend

originalText.text: I purchased a pair of Palomas from Christopher Cloos last year and absolutely loved them. The fit was excellent and the frame felt very sturdy. The polarized lenses were very clear and high quality. Unfortunately, an arm of the glasses just fell off when I attempted to put them on. It looks like it was the metal piece connecting the arm to the frame. I contacted the company and was quickly informed they would completely replace the frame. Assuming this is true, I am very happy with the quality and fit of the glasses and impressed with the company’s solution and quick response time. I will update this review regarding the status of the replacement.

text.text: I purchased a pair of Palomas from Christopher Cloos last year and absolutely loved them. The fit was excellent and the frame felt very sturdy. The polarized lenses were very clear and high quality. Unfortunately, an arm of the glasses just fell off when I attempted to put them on. It looks like it was the metal piece connecting the arm to the frame. I contacted the company and was quickly informed they would completely replace the frame. Assuming this is true, I am very happy with the quality and fit of the glasses and impressed with the company’s solution and quick response time. I will update this review regarding the status of the replacement.

originalText.text: Easily the best/favorite pair of sunglasses I’ve ever had! Almost every time I wear them in public, I’ll get compliments and asked where I purchased these. Moving forward, Christopher Cloos will be my go to brand for all eyewear products and I highly recommend to give them a shot! Customer support is amazing as well and helped me replace a broken pair of sunglasses very quickly. You will not regret purchasing from here!!

originalText.text:
Bought a pair of sunglasses - through normal wear one of the screws became loose and fell out. I went to a number of repair shops around NYC (including an official retailer) and none of them have the correct screw (apparently it’s unique?). At this point I’m waiting to hear from their customer service team.

Update: their customer service was very accommodating and was able to help me get this resolved quickly - updating to 5 stars
